definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Objective To observe the distribution of the neuropeptides in mouse sublingual gland.

sentences.english: Conclusion Hypoglossal schwannoma is extremely rare.

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of methyl carprost suppository given sublingually on postpartum bleeding in normal parturients.
